content.description: Framework for developing RESTful Web Services in Java that provides support for JAX-RS APIs.

content.description: Java library to generate text output (HTML web pages, e-mails, configuration files, source code, etc.) based on templates and changing data.

content.description: Logic-less Templates. There are no if statements, else clauses, or for loops. Instead there are only tags.

content.description: Spring Boot integration for Spring Security's OAuth2/OpenID Connect client features.

content.description: Spring Boot integration for Spring Security's OAuth2 resource server features.

content.description: Makes it easier to build Spring based applications that use the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol.

content.description: Okta specific configuration for Spring Security/Spring Boot OAuth2 features. Enable your Spring Boot application to work with Okta via OAuth 2.0/OIDC.

content.name: Spring Data JPA

content.description: Persist data in SQL stores with plain JDBC using Spring Data.

content.description: Provides Reactive Relational Database Connectivity to persist data in SQL stores using Spring Data in reactive applications.

content.description: MySQL JDBC and R2DBC driver.

content.name: H2 Database
content.description: Provides a fast in-memory database that supports JDBC API and R2DBC access, with a small (2mb) footprint. Supports embedded and server modes as well as a browser based console application.

content.name: JDBC API
content.description: Database Connectivity API that defines how a client may connect and query a database.

content.name: MyBatis Framework
content.description: Persistence framework with support for custom SQL, stored procedures and advanced mappings. MyBatis couples objects with stored procedures or SQL statements using a XML descriptor or annotations.

content.name: PostgreSQL Driver
content.description: A JDBC and R2DBC driver that allows Java programs to connect to a PostgreSQL database using standard, database independent Java code.

content.description: A JDBC and R2DBC driver that provides access to Microsoft SQL Server and Azure SQL Database from any Java application.

content.description: Lightweight 100% Java SQL Database Engine.

content.description: An open source relational database implemented entirely in Java.

content.name: Liquibase Migration
content.description: Liquibase database migration and source control library.

content.description: Version control for your database so you can migrate from any version (incl. an empty database) to the latest version of the schema.

content.name: JOOQ Access Layer
content.description: Generate Java code from your database and build type safe SQL queries through a fluent API.

content.name: Spring Data Redis (Access+Driver)

content.description: Access Redis key-value data stores in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Redis.

content.name: Spring Data MongoDB

content.description: Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure for MongoDB.

content.description: A distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine with Spring Data Elasticsearch.

content.description: Access Cassandra NoSQL Database in a reactive fashion

content.description: Access Couchbase NoSQL database in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Couchbase.
